items.sentence: Please play it back for me after you've finished the recording.
I'm afraid I won't be able to make myself understand in French.
I'm thinking of going to the States during the summer vacation.
The school is located within five minutes' walk of the station.
A company that stifles innovation can't hope to grow very much.
You learn a lot about yourself when you do something like that.
It's clear that Tom still believes that that's going to happen.
Tom was unable to completely give up his hope of marrying Mary.
For the time being, my sister is an assistant in a supermarket.
It'll be impossible for me to finish my term paper by tomorrow.
Compared to last summer, we haven't had so much rain this year.
Please don't forget to turn off the light before you go to bed.
Making friends with people from other countries is interesting.
Since the bus was late, we had to wait in the rain a long time.
Don't argue when you are angry and don't eat when you are full.
We weren't able to buy tickets, so we didn't go to the concert.
My little brother says that he had a dreadful dream last night.
All the furniture in the abandoned house was covered with dust.
Tom and Mary travelled together around the world on a sailboat.
Didn't you know that Tom was going to go to Australia tomorrow?
